name: SHADOW_DIALOGUES
prompt_base: Noir cinematic with single-beam key light and ambient edge lighting (5:1 ratio). Matte graphite wall with narrow beam spotlight, background smoke gradient 10%. Facing camera, tilt head 30° to side, glasses worn low on nose bridge, eyes visible through tinted lens. Hero item (sunglasses) on model's face + 2 supporting reflections (mirror + lens close-up). Mirror fragment catching lens reflection, blown-out highlight on frame edge. Shape: Oversized aviator, angular lens cut. Material: Gradient-tinted polycarbonate with steel wireframe. Key Feature: Floating lens illusion with invisible nose bridge.
negative_prompt: Cliché beach scene, colorful backdrop, overexposure, smiling model, plastic look.
